parsed_json.name: Pushups
parsed_json.summary: One of the most fundamental bodyweight exercises and are very popular. The movement is simple, can be done everywhere and it's very effective because you are using a lot of muscles at the same time.
parsed_json.start_position: Tilt your pelvis backward and keep your butt squeezed tight

steps.description: Place your wrist in a nearly vertical line under your shoulder when you do the standard pushup.
For when you are doing pseudo-planch pushups which put the focus more on your shoulder.
For example when you are doing swing pushups which are a triceps dominant movement.
Go all the way up and all the way down and let your body straight.

When you are going down your shoulder blades come together and when you are going up they go apart. You should also focus on pushing them downward instead of upward but don't forget there is still difference between the passive and an active way of this shoulder blade movement.
